meanings.definition: To record a debit in an account.
meanings.sent1: I am debiting the amount from your account.
meanings.sent2: She always debits her expenses promptly.
meanings.sent3: The computer made a mistake by debiting twice the amount.
meanings.sent4: Debiting the incorrect amount can lead to financial errors.
meanings.sent5: Remember to debit the correct amount to avoid confusion.

meanings.definition: To deduct or subtract from a balance.
meanings.sent1: He is debiting the overcharge from the bill.
meanings.sent2: They debited the returned items from the total.
meanings.sent3: The cashier mistakenly started debiting the wrong amount.
meanings.sent4: Debiting unnecessary fees can impact your savings.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to carefully debit any discounts from the total.
